page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: Greenstead Green, Stisted, Tumblers Green,Priors Green and Burtons Green are set in a rural and picturesque part of North East Essex. The undulating countryside has plenty of hedgerows, farmland and woodland which support a variety of wildlife and plant life. Two thirds of the area is farmland growing a variety of cereal crops while a third of the area is woodland, mainly decidious, which supports a fine herd of fallow deer and a few muntjac. Many people in the area use these woods for walking and during the shooting season, organised shoots take place, mainly for the pheasants that are allowed to feed freely. There are no main roads, shops or industrail processes carried on in this block.
